In addition , previous clinical trial address calcium intake . While vitamin D may modulate blood pressure via action activation renin angiotensin aldosterone system , also possible vitamin D mediate blood pressure via effect gastrointestinal calcium absorption . This pilot study one arm study , assess safety feasibility supplement 15 young adult African ancestry low vitamin D level 5,000 IU Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) combine 1000 mg elemental calcium daily 3 month . DOC.brief_title: Blood Pressure Blacks Calcium ( BBC ) Vitamin D Study
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study recruit 15 black U.S. adult age 25-45 year age 25 ( OH ) D level < 20 ng/ml use anti-hypertensive medication rest seat systolic blood pressure ≥ 120 mmHg measure baseline level total 25 ( OH ) D , 25 ( OH ) D2 , 25 ( OH ) D3 , free vitamin 25 ( OH ) D , active vitamin D [ 1,25 ( OH ) D ] , parathyroid hormone level , serum calcium , 24-hour calcium excretion . Participants take supplement vitamin D3 5000 IU elemental calcium 1000 mg daily three month . Investigators measure change blood pressure , total 25 ( OH ) D , 25 ( OH ) D2 25 ( OH ) D3 , 1,25 ( OH ) D free 25 ( OH ) D , parathyroid hormone level , serum calcium 24-hour urine calcium excretion three month period . The overall goal collect pilot data determine feasibility large trial determine whether vitamin D combine calcium lower blood pressure young black adult low 25 ( OH ) D level . This single arm non-blinded feasibility study 15 participant . The study population consist 15 adult age 25-45 year self-reported African American race/ethnicity . All participant provide write informed consent . Intervention : This study one arm participant receive Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) 5,000 IU daily 3 month 1000 mg calcium citrate daily 3 month . There placebo blinding agent . Participants receive 3 month supply drug administer Loyola pharmacy . Serum vitamin D calcium level measure study initiation 6 12 week ( study end ) . Participants stop take stop vitamin D calcium administration serum calcium level great equal 10.6 meq/L and/or 25 ( OH ) D level great equal 80 ng/dl 6 week visit . Safety Monitoring : The investigator query hospitalization emergency room visit past month reason visit baseline , 6 12 week follow-up visit . Serum calcium vitamin D level measure 6 12 week anyone serum calcium level ≥ 10.6 meq/L and/or 25 ( OH ) D level ≥ 80 ng/ml stop treatment . All adverse event report Loyola University Chicago Health Sciences Institutional Review Board . A data safety monitor board review data collect completion 6 week visit ensure safety study . Stopping plan : Any participant develops serum calcium level ≥ 10.6 meq/L and/or 25 ( OH ) D level ≥ 80 ng/ml stop treatment continue monitor study week 12 serum calcium 25 ( OH ) D level measure end study . The study continue participant follow 12 week . Analysis Plan : This feasibility study examine multiple aspect pilot data include total number person enrol vs. number total person identify eligible . Pill count do 6 12 week visit ass compliance vitamin D calcium supplementation . The percentage participant take 80 % vitamin D3 supplement calcium supplement determine . The number participant report symptom adverse event quantify . Repeated measure analysis variance model use assess change outcome measure include systolic diastolic blood pressure , vitamin D measure , parathyroid hormone level 24-hour urine calcium excretion value .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 2545 year 2 . Selfreported race/ethnicity African American 3 . BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 4 . Total 25 ( OH ) D level < 20 ng/ml ( 50 nmol/L ) 5 . No use vitamin D supplement within past 30 day screen visit 6 . Able provide write informed consent 7 . Willing take vitamin D supplement daily 3 month 8 . Willing return followup visit measure blood pressure provide blood sample measure vitamin D serum calcium 9 . No current use blood pressure lower medication 10 . Systolic blood pressure ≥ 120 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≥ 60 mmHg 1 . Medical history chronic disease affect gastrointestinal absorption vitamin D : Crohn 's disease , cystic fibrosis , celiac disease 2 . Use medication may affect total 25 ( OH ) D level : antiepileptic drug , steroid , bile acid sequestrants , lipase inhibitor , orlistat 3 . Current use vitamin D supplement use past month unwillingness discontinue least 1 month prior study enrollment 4 . History kidney stone hypercalciuria 5 . Fasting serum calcium ≥ 10.2 mg/dl 6 . Average systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 mmHg 7 . Average diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mmHg 8 . Presence type 1 diabetes mellitus , active malignancy , active thyroid disease sarcoidosis 9 . Pregnant planning pregnancy 10 . Estimated glomerular filtration rate ( base serum creatinine level ) < 60 ml/min/1.73 m2 base Modification Diet Renal Disease formula
